entry.title: üéâ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a ‚≠êÔ∏è

entry.title: Goodnotes 6: AI Notes & Docs
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Marketplace ContentÔºö$6.99 ‚Üí $1.99 [$1.99 ~ $10.99]

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

In-App Purchases

  • Goodnotes 6 (1 year)Ôºö$11.99
  • GoodNotes 5 UnlockÔºö$9.99
  • Goodnotes 6 Free TrialÔºö$0.00
  • Goodnotes 6 One-Time PaymentÔºö$28.99
  • Goodnotes 6 (1 Year)Ôºö$11.99
  • Marketplace ContentÔºö$1.99
  • Dotted Squares: Draft PapersÔºö$0.99

Application Description

Ever wish your notes could do more? With Goodnotes 6, they can! Step into the future of note-taking with Goodnotes 6, the best AI notebook for iPad. Write notes, convert handwriting to text, annotate PDFs, and use AI tools for study and productivity. Boost Professional Efficiency and Productivity ‚Ä¢ Use Ask Goodnotes to summarize, translate, and extract key insights from your notes, PDFs, and documents‚Äîperfect for your next important meeting. ‚Ä¢ Import, annotate, and organize PDFs, documents, and meeting notes. ‚Ä¢ Transcribe audio recordings from meetings so you never miss a detail. ‚Ä¢ Present like a pro, with a built-in laser pointer that is perfect for meetings and presentations. ‚Ä¢ Export and share notes via email, print, PDF, or images for easy collaboration. ‚Ä¢ Send files directly to your unique Goodnotes email for quick access on all devices. ‚Ä¢ New pen gestures like Scribble to Erase let you erase by scribbling, while Circle to Select helps you quickly select and edit notes‚Äîall without switching tools. ‚Ä¢ Convert handwriting to text for quick and clean professional notes. ‚Ä¢ Sync your notes across all devices with cloud sync through iCloud, Google Drive, OneDrive, Dropbox, and WebDAV. Powerful Digital Notes and Study Tools ‚Ä¢ Use AI-powered study tools help you learn faster and retain more information. ‚Ä¢ Use Ask Goodnotes to generate practice quizzes, summarize text, or answer questions, directly from your handwriting. ‚Ä¢ Powered by our in-house AI technology, Math Assist, converts handwriting to text on iPad and solves handwritten equations instantly. ‚Ä¢ Convert equations to LaTeX format for easy use in reports and presentations. ‚Ä¢ Memorize vocabulary and key concepts with AI-powered Study Sets using active recall and spaced repetition. ‚Ä¢ No more flipping through pages: Handwriting search makes all your notes instantly searchable, even handwritten ones. ‚Ä¢ Collaborate in real time with classmates by working on the same document for group projects and study sessions ‚Ä¢ Record audio with live transcription while taking notes, so you never miss a detail. Easily edit, search, and remove text from the transcript to review key points faster. Enhance Creative Digital Planning ‚Ä¢ Design fully customizable notebooks, templates, and covers to fit your style. ‚Ä¢ Mix handwriting, text, stickers, images, and drawings in a single notebook. ‚Ä¢ Stay focused with Smart Timer, and boost your productivity. ‚Ä¢ Browse the in-app Marketplace for stickers, washi tape patterns, as well as stylish templates, educational materials, and planners. ‚Ä¢ Organize your notes with unlimited folders and advanced search. ‚Ä¢ Get exclusive monthly downloads every month with a paid subscription. ‚Ä¢ Use creative tools like pencil, tape, lasso tool, layering, eyedropper, and image cropping to make your planner truly yours. Experience the best AI note app for students, professionals, and planners. Join millions of users who have transformed their workflow with Goodnotes 6, the best note-taking app for iPad. Download Goodnotes 6 for free and create your first notebook today. Website: www.goodnotes.com X: @goodnotesapp Instagram: @goodnotes.app Pinterest: @goodnotesapp TikTok: @goodnotesapp Privacy policy: https://www.goodnotes.com/privacy-policy Terms and Conditions: https://www.goodnotes.com/terms-and-conditions

entry.title: 8mm Vintage Camera
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • 8mm ProÔºö$39.99 ‚Üí $9.99 [$9.99 ~ $39.99]

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$3.99

In-App Purchases

  • 8mm ProÔºö$9.99
  • Silent Film ThemeÔºö$0.00
  • Light Leak ThemeÔºö$0.00
  • Countdown ThemeÔºö$0.00

Application Description

8mm is so realistic it was even used to film scenes in the Oscar-winning documentary Searching for Sugar Man! We have established the de facto standard of real-time retro film emulation. It was featured by Apple in App of the Day, App of the Week, In the Director's Chair, App Store Essentials, etc. 8mm Vintage Camera captures the beauty and magic of old-school vintage movies right through your viewfinder. Dust and scratches, retro colors, flickering, light leaks, and even frame shake, all can be instantly added with a single tap of the finger. SHOOT BOTH PHOTOS AND VIDEOS WITH SOPHISTICATED LIVE EFFECTS ‚Ä¢ Combine effects of film color, halation, dust & scratch, film grain, and softening to create authentic old-school movies ‚Ä¢ Adjust the strength of the effects to achieve your own unique visual style ‚Ä¢ 10 Lenses (frame) effects: Projector, Vignetting, Light Leak, Color Fringing, Super 8, Screen, 16mm, Tube, color negatives of Super 8 and 16mm ‚Ä¢ 21 Retro & Aged Films: 1920, Noir, 60s, 70s, Sakura, XPro, Siena, Pela, Indigo, Tuscan, Two-Color, 2-Strip, 3X, and monochromes ‚Ä¢ Additional 21 filters that emulate real historical films and expired films - available with the 8mm Pro subscription ‚Ä¢ Jitter Button to imitate real 8mm projectors frame shakes ‚Ä¢ Sound Switch to add projector sound for extra authenticity or mute the video for a silent movie effect. ‚Ä¢ Up to 4K 30fps with original unfiltered video recording on newer devices A COMPACT EDITOR FOR MOVIE CREATION - Apply film and frame effects to clips - Trim video, pan & zoom photo - Add a soundtrack from your music library - Choose from 5 unique themes with matching titles, transitions 8MM PRO SUBSCRIPTION - You can subscribe or make a one-time purchase for unlimited access to all current filters and future updates - Start your subscription with a free 7-day trial. Once the trial is over, you‚Äôll be charged an annual subscription fee - Your subscription will automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. You can go to your Settings > Apple ID > Subscriptions to turn auto-renew off

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

Application Description

Revitalize your Apple Music library! TuneShift intelligently matches your cherished music from NetEase Cloud Music and QQ Music to Apple Music platform. Say goodbye to tedious manual searching. With just a few simple steps, rediscover your complete music collection on Apple Music. Our smart engine ensures you find the closest matches to your original favorites. Core Advantages: ‚Ä¢ Premium music matching engine for precise track identification ‚Ä¢ Preserve complete collection structure and playback order ‚Ä¢ Real-time progress display ‚Ä¢ Minimalist design with one-click operation Privacy Protection: We prioritize user privacy, strictly adhering to privacy protocols to ensure your account information remains secure. Why Choose TuneShift: Professional music identification technology Superior matching accuracy Swift processing efficiency User-friendly interface Let TuneShift be your professional music management tool for the perfect Apple Music experience!

  • Hero Sha'TraÔºö$2.99

  • Hero TrabucoÔºö$2.99

Application Description

From the creators of the award winner, Kingdom Rush saga comes the most extraordinary space odyssey. Fight challenging real time strategy sci fi battles on amazing and unknown planets. Command brave soldiers, mighty mechas and powerful aliens against hordes of space monsters, swarms of insectoids and robot armies in a galaxy far far away. PLAN, ATTACK AND BEAT ALL THE ENEMIES ADAPTING YOUR STRATEGY by changing the role of your troops even in the thick of the combat, from ranger to sniper, from flamethrowers to missile launchers. ADAPT YOUR STRATEGY by changing the role of your troops even in the thick of battle, from ranger to sniper, from flamethrowers to missile launchers. RECRUIT AND TRAIN THE GREATEST HEROES in the galaxy, lead them into dangerous territory against near-impossible odds and unleash their mighty powers and abilities. TURN THE TIDE OF BATTLE with orbital strikes, intelligent mines, support troops, turrets and a wide array of special weapons. Armies of robots, crushed starships, gigantic monsters, unknown races, brave assaults, desperate rescues, audacious sabotages... the galaxy needs your command. The galaxy needs the Iron Marines FEATURES ‚Ä¢ 21 CAMPAIGN MISSIONS across three sci fi planets. Each action-packed challenge will have you improve your strategy to save the galaxy! ‚Ä¢ 17 SPECIAL OPERATIONS that will test if you have what it takes to battle your way through space. ‚Ä¢ 40+ UPGRADES to build the ultimate RTS army! Choose between Defense Drones, Napalm Rockets, Ricocheting Blasts, Lethal Weapons and many more. ‚Ä¢ +7 UNITS to bring into battle and give your hero some extra firepower! ‚Ä¢ 8 SPECIAL WEAPONS to unleash hell on your enemies and keep expanding your tactics like space itself! What‚Äôs better than a well-placed missile? An orbital strike of 50 high-explosive missiles! ‚Ä¢ DEFEAT UNIQUE BOSSES in epic battles. They are green, mean, killing machines!!! Well‚Ä¶ some are machines and these aliens aren‚Äôt green‚Ä¶ but they‚Äôre all massive and determined to crush you. Suit up, Marines! ‚Ä¢ 70+ ACHIEVEMENTS to complete and show everyone you‚Äôre the best RTS commander in the whole galaxy! ‚Ä¢ NO WI-FI IN SPACE? No worries, offline play guaranteed! ‚Ä¢ CHOOSE YOUR DIFFICULTY MODE: Casual, Normal or Veteran. Don‚Äôt get cocky! Or Do! Your choice! ‚Ä¢ IMPOSSIBLE MODE. Only for the most daring, reckless, all-out-of-bubblegum marines in space. We dare you!

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: The Greedy Cave
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Coupon of the Greedy CaveÔºö$9.99 ‚Üí $3.99 [$0.99 ~ $9.99]

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$0.99

In-App Purchases

  • [A heap of crystals]Ôºö$0.99
  • [A box of crystals]Ôºö$2.99
  • [A package of crystals]Ôºö$3.99
  • [A big package of crystals]Ôºö$9.99
  • [A chest of crystals]Ôºö$19.99
  • Coupon of the Greedy CaveÔºö$3.99
  • Package4Ôºö$9.99
  • [A big chest of crystals]Ôºö$49.99

Application Description

In a land far, far away there once was a vast continent called Milton. It was a land where the power of rule came by the sword and the arcane, where Men who devoted themselves to the blade or to magecraft, could become the finest warriors, wisest wizards or the greatest adventurers. In this land, there are several kingdoms divided by borders but united through history. Countless stories of alliances, upheaval, and moments of peace bedeck this tapestry, but that is a tale for another day. Our story begins in a remote kingdom to the north, Iblis, an obscure and oft-forgotten place. It is a wild and barren land, a place where its people scrape a living from the earth, mining minerals for the lords of the south. On occasion, adventurers would stop by for the night but never linger. Until one day, a fledgling adventurer lost his way and stumbled into a hole. The story might have ended then had he not come back, but return he did, with sacks of gold and glittering treasure. Like a fierce gale from the north, news of his fame and fortune fanned across the kingdoms overnight, and kings sent their bravest warriors and adventurers to clear the cavern of monsters in search of treasure. Even peasants wanting a part of this newfound wealth partook in these expeditions. In no time at all, a bustling town had sprung up in this forgotten place. People set up camps, and formed their own groups to explore the cave. Clever merchants not missing this opportunity, built taverns and shops near the cave, selling equipment and potions to eager adventurers. At first, everything seemed fine. As explorers delved into the caves, they encountered new creatures and discovered new treasures. Mysteries continued to pour forth from the cave, yet nobody knew where the source of the secrets lay. However, as the explorations continued, the balance of wealth beyond the cave began to waver, and cracks appeared among those adventurers who had previously worked arm-in-arm. The latecomers or weak, limited to wandering the upper levels of the cave, could only watch as the veteran adventurers brought treasure after treasure from the deep. They began harboring dark thoughts as they watched the veteran adventurers grow arrogant from their largesse, ordering people around, hoarding secrets from the rest. The place became a festering pool of suspicions and greed, mired in a jealous rage. It started with an adventurer disappearing in the cave. Rumors circulated he had found some legendary treasure and hoarded it for himself. Others said he had been guided to another world by some mysterious magic force in the cave. Still, the unspoken belief was that he had been murdered by a rival party and was buried somewhere beneath the caverns. Nobody knows exactly what happened, but people have continued to disappear ever since. As more people have gone missing, some adventurers have called it quits, others cling to hope, and a few continue to wait and see. Which brings us to you, an ordinary young man, coming into this extraordinary circumstance with purposes unknown to others. May you find what you seek in ... -------------------------------------------------------- In " The Greedy Cave", you are a brave adventurer tasked with exploring a mysterious cave and battling all kinds of monsters. Use your wits to defeat them, learn different skills, gain mighty equipment, challenge evil monster bosses, and decipher the mystery surrounding this cave... Game Features ¬∑Randomly generated cave levels provide a different game experience every time! ¬∑Hundreds of monsters to defeat! ¬∑Hundreds of equipment to collect! ¬∑Hundreds of quests and achievements to conquer! ¬∑Enchant/Reform/Level up/Gold collecting, and more abundant systems to explore! Contact us cs.thegreedycave@avalongames.com https://www.facebook.com/greedycave/

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Don't Starve: Shipwrecked
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$4.99 ‚Üí $2.99 [$2.99 ~ $4.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$2.99

Application Description

Klei Entertainment has partnered with our friends at CAPY, creators of Superbrothers: Sword and Sworcery, Super Time Force and Below; to bring fans of Don‚Äôt Starve the latest single-player expansion: Don‚Äôt Starve: Shipwrecked! In Don't Starve: Shipwrecked, Wilson finds himself stranded in a tropical archipelago. He must learn to survive all over again in this new environment filled with new biomes, seasons, and creatures. Don‚Äôt let the tropical breeze lull you into a false sense of security - the world might be different, but it is still equal parts unforgiving and uncompromising. You will quickly find these islands are full to the brim with things that want to kill you. Key Features: Navigate the Open Ocean: Craft a boat and set sail for adventure! Explore an Entirely New World: The entire world is different. Explore new biomes filled with new resources. Scavenge for new sources of food. Run for your life from a host of new creatures. Brave New Seasons: A set of tropically inspired seasons will try their hardest to kill you. Craft New Recipes: Build an array of new gadgets to help yourself survive these harsh islands.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Little Big Workshop
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$9.99 ‚Üí $1.99 [$1.99 ~ $9.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$1.99

Application Description

Imagine a magical factory, appearing right in your living room. A carefully planned masterpiece, where diligent workers throw together anything customers want. Rubber ducks and dressers, drones and electric guitars, scooters and other wonderful goods can be created from many different materials and sold for hard cash ‚Äì cash you invest right back into your factory to get more machines, more workers and grow your business. In Little Big Workshop you become a factory tycoon! Real factories - made FUN You are the Big Boss and it‚Äôs time to take charge of your very own tabletop factory. Organize the factory floor, manage your workers, purchase machinery, and design efficient production lines - all within the time-limit and to your client's satisfaction! An open-ended sandbox-experience Take it easy, it‚Äôs a sandbox-experience where you think, ponder and poke at things until you get it to work the way you‚Äôd like. Supply products to clients and an ever-changing market, as you produce over 50 unique product types, built from multiple parts and pieces - all of which can be created with different materials and production methods. No two factories should ever look the same. Tiny hands, big dreams Start out with just a small workshop and expand to a desk-filling factory. Unlock ever fancier machines, add even more production methods, and most of all, more room. Soon enough you‚Äôll be running multiple production lines, producing hundreds of advanced products each day, and watching with joy as your cute workers do the actual work. Features: - Varying industries and a wide range of products - Focus on practical problems, not on values, economics, or logistics - Organize all steps of the production on a blueprint - Factories grow as you unlock more desk space - Fully simulated Day/Night-cycle - Take care of your workers! Work them too hard and they drop like flies - Cute model-town art-style

Due to memory constraints, it will not run on older devices.*** Don‚Äôt Starve: Pocket Edition, brings the hit PC game enjoyed by over 4 million players to the iPhone and iPad. Now you can experience the uncompromising wilderness survival game full of science and magic on the go! Play as Wilson, an intrepid Gentleman Scientist who has been trapped and transported to a mysterious wilderness world. Wilson must learn to exploit his environment and its inhabitants if he ever hopes to escape and find his way back home. Enter a strange and unexplored world full of strange creatures, dangers, and surprises. Gather resources to craft items and structures that match your survival style. Play your way as you unravel the mysteries of this strange land. ******************************************************** Awards: - Independent Games Festival: Grand Prize Nominee - Independent Games Festival: Excellence in Design Nominee - Independent Games Festival: Audience Award Nominee - Capsule Computers: Editor‚Äôs Choice - Indie Game Reviewer: Game of the Year Key Features: Optimized for Touch: New intuitive touch interface lets you explore, fight, craft and manage inventory with ease. Uncompromising Survival & World Exploration: No instructions. No help. No hand holding. Start with nothing and craft, hunt, research, farm and fight to survive. Dark and Whimsical Visuals: 2D characters and odd creatures inhabiting a unique 3D world. Randomly Generated New Worlds: Want a new map? No problem! Application Description

A Simple Time Management App That Will Increase Your Productivity Keeping yourself focused on tasks can be not easy sometimes. FocusDots is a beautifully designed timer to improve your focus on tasks and discard activity that can divert your attention. FocusDots is a simple time management app with four easy steps: 1) Decide on a single task to be done. 2) Start FocusDots and work on the task until the timer finishes (25 minutes). 3) Take a short break (5 minutes). 4) After completing four Dots, go for a longer break (15 minutes) Features - Elegant minimalist design - Daily Summary - Beautiful crafted design themes - Quotes to inspire and motivate you - Custom timer duration for your tasks Thank you for choosing FocusDots! We sincerely appreciate your support and hope that our app helps you enhance your productivity and time management skills. If you have any feedback or suggestions, we'd love to hear from you!

entry.title: FyTube - YouTube Without Ads
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$4.99 ‚Üí Free [Free ~ $19.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

Application Description

Our app connects to YouTube in real-time and lets you play any video with exclusive features designed just for you! Highlight Features: ‚Ä¢ Locked screen playback: Keep listening to your videos‚Äô audio in the background. ‚Ä¢ Floating playback (PIP): Use other apps while watching your videos. ‚Ä¢ Sleep timer: Set an automatic shutdown and relax worry-free. ‚Ä¢ Loop mode: Play your favorite video on infinite repeat. It also includes: ‚Ä¢ Toggleable subtitles ‚Ä¢ Playback speed control ‚Ä¢ Quality selection and fullscreen mode ‚Ä¢ Smart search with real-time suggestions (predictive search) ‚Ä¢ Upload date filters: Day, week, month, or year FyTube is perfect for those who don‚Äôt want to miss a single video about their favorite topics. Explore, play, and enjoy your favorite content to the fullest ‚Äî interruption-free! SPECIAL FEATURES FLOATING PLAYBACK Never stop watching! With this feature, you can keep watching your videos while using other apps . Just enter fullscreen mode and tap the PIP button ‚Äî it‚Äôs the second icon at the top of the player. Your video will float on top of your screen no matter what app you open! LOCKED SCREEN PLAYBACK Listen without interruptions! Keep enjoying your video‚Äôs audio even when your screen is off. Perfect for listening to music, podcasts, or your favorite tunes while driving or relaxing. How to activate it? Just lock your device screen. You‚Äôll instantly see the background player. Tap Play ‚Äî and that‚Äôs it! The audio will keep going without pauses. SLEEP TIMER Fall asleep peacefully ‚Äî your app will stop by itself! Enable this feature to automatically stop your videos after the time you choose. Perfect for sleeping or napping without worrying about stopping anything. How to activate it? Tap the timer button, choose how long you want it to run, and that‚Äôs it. Relax and let the app handle the rest! LOOP MODE Play your favorite video over and over again! Enable this feature to make the video repeat automatically as many times as you want. How to know if it‚Äôs on? The icon will turn red when active. (VoiceOver compatible: it will indicate whether it‚Äôs on or off.) Perfect for songs, meditations, or any content you love to repeat! Need help using these features? Visit: fydub.com/fytube BASIC FEATURES ‚Ä¢ Fullscreen high-quality video playback ‚Ä¢ Easy-to-use interface, friendly design ‚Ä¢ Skip forward or rewind anytime ‚Äî never miss the best parts ‚Ä¢ Subtitle activation ‚Ä¢ Adjust playback speed to your preference ‚Ä¢ Change video quality ‚Ä¢ Smart search with real-time suggestions and upload date filters: day, week, month, year, all ‚Ä¢ Each video includes a related videos section to discover more interesting content ‚Ä¢ Discover the latest videos and stay up to date with the news ‚Ä¢ Our app connects directly to YouTube, letting you find any video ‚Ä¢ Enjoy content on any AirPlay-compatible device ‚Ä¢ VoiceOver compatible (enhanced descriptions) ‚Ä¢ No account required ‚Ä¢ We don‚Äôt store cache, cookies, or personal data without your permission ‚Äî watch safely ‚Ä¢ Interface available in 29 languages ‚Ä¢ NO ADS, NO SUBSCRIPTIONS Get FyTube with a one-time payment and start a new streaming experience ‚Äî ad-free and subscription-free. Minimum Requirements: ‚Ä¢ iOS 13 or later ‚Ä¢ 3G connection or higher Privacy Policy: https://fydub.com/privacy-policy_fytube Terms of Service: https://fydub.com/terms-of-service_fytube Keywords related to our app: youtube, youtube music, youtube vanced, ad blocker for YouTube, no subscription, skip ads on YouTube, music without ads, ad-free, YouTube app, adblocker for YouTube, block pop-ups, remove ads, block ads, adblock, content blocker, no ads, ad-free browser, block advertising, skip ads, ad-free music, YouTube without ads, videos without ads, etc. Have questions about how to use FyTube? Visit fydub.com/fytube or write to us ‚Äî we‚Äôll be happy to help. We reply to all emails: fytube@fydub.com FyTube works with YouTube. The YouTube name and logo are trademarks of Google, Inc. All rights reserved. ¬© FyTube¬Æ

entry.title: AeroPads - Pads & Soundscapes
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Orbit PackÔºö$4.99 ‚Üí $1.99 [$1.99 ~ $4.99]

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$5.99

In-App Purchases

  • Orbit PackÔºö$1.99

Application Description

Have you ever struggled to find confidence on stage or inspiration in the studio? AeroPads cues immersive pads and soundscapes that inspire and equip you to perform and write your best. ENHANCE YOUR SOUND. ENGAGE YOUR AUDIENCE. Every musician has experienced an empty mix or an awkward transition. When using AeroPads, you instantly add more dimension and character to your sound. With a more immersive mix and the ability to perform smooth and seamless transitions, you will feel more confident while your audience will be more engaged. FOR EVERY MUSICIAN. Pads and soundscapes are a versatile accompaniment to nearly any style of music. Whether you are a soloist or full band, AeroPads will take your sound to the next level. Rock bands, worship teams, wedding singers, producers, songwriters, and instrumentalists are just a few of the many types of musicians that have loved using AeroPads. DESIGNED FOR THE STAGE. INSPIRED BY SPACE. AeroPads features creative and immersive soundscapes paired with a beautiful and intuitive interface, all inspired by the pinnacle of exploration and inspiration: outer space. CREATIVITY THAT SPARKS CREATIVITY. AeroPads aren't your typical pads. Most pads out there are really boring or insanely obnoxious. However, AeroPads features thoughtfully crafted soundscapes that are meticulously fine-tuned with the perfect amount of harmonic and textural movement. Simply put, AeroPads won't step on the toes of your arrangement or get on the nerves of your sound guy (like most other pads out there). Highlighted Features: - A beautiful space-inspired interface with a simple and intuitive design. - Live View: Every key and three of your favorite patches are instantly accessible (best suited for experimentation, free-flowing sets, and songwriting). - Setlist View: Plan and build a detailed setlist (best suited for structured sets and seamless transitions). - The iconic Atmosphere Soundpack which includes five unique patches named after and inspired by the layers of Earth's atmosphere. - Three patches can be added to Live View to be made instantly accessible, so there's no need to dig through menus to just to change a patch when performing live. - Additional patches and Soundpacks available for purchase. - Key-specific pads in multiple tonalities: major, minor, and neutral. - Concert pitch adjustment. How to Use: 01. Cue a pad that matches the key of your musical arrangement. 02. Play overtop of the accompanying pads and soundcapes. 03. Enjoy the boost of audience engagement, musician confidence, and creative inspiration. Pads and soundscapes are intended as a subtle accompaniment to musical arrangements/performances. They are designed to be cued according to the key of the arrangement. Once cued, you'll hear a droning pad centered around the root note with additional harmonic textures within the selected key. The only time a pad's key should change within a song is in the instance of a key change. For best results, mix AeroPads appropriately within the overall mix. When mixed too loud, AeroPads may compete with melodies and the arrangement. When mixed too quietly, AeroPads may be less effective. When mixed appropriately, they will sound awesome.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

entry.title: SOULVARS
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$4.99 ‚Üí $1.99 [$1.99 ~ $4.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$1.99

Application Description

Deck-Building JRPG "SOULVARS" is now available! 15-20 hours of playtime (+50h to go deeper) Dynamic pixel animation and battles and a rich customization system No In-App Purchases. While having a deep strategic sense, the vertically held smartphone controls allow for simple and exhilarating battles, training, dungeon exploration, and collection of random enchanted items. ‚ñº Story A world line in which even the fictitious concept of the soul can be converted into data. In return, people's lives are threatened by the sudden appearance of deformities. The protagonists use the Soul Driver, a device that converts souls into data. They are responsible for the elimination of the deformities that threaten people, and work in a certain town... ‚ñºSystem Overview Number of save slots: 3 (Saved in device and manual save) Estimated scenario completion time: 14 to 20 hours 50 to 100+ hours of post-clearance challenge Features Soul bits (handbills), which are the data of the soul power that resides in gear (equipment), Players can combine them in battle to make special attacks and combos in a successive manner. The characters are characterized by their action with dots that move around. ‚ñºGear and Soul Bits Soul bits (hand cards) can be drawn from gear (equipment) and used as actions during battle. The combination of main weapon, subweapon, armor, and accessories Strategy (deck) is determined. ‚ñºArts During a battle, only one soul bit can be selected on the first turn, but The number of soul bits that can be selected at one time increases depending on the opponent's weaknesses, guarding, evading, buffing, debuffing, and various other conditions. The combination of soul bits (cards in hand) selected at the same time activates a skill called Arts.
